EmailTemplate.subject: New Look Member Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Salutation} {!Account.Name}
Greetings from Freedom Financial Planners. Hope all well with you.
We are happy to share with you that we have added a few interesting features to your member portal, which already maintains reports of your investments and details of your financial plan.
Your member portal can be accessed on www.ffreedom.in - Member login section with you Member Id and Password.
The following new features have been added under “My Portfolio” tab -
Ø Allocation Tab - Percentage of investments in equity and debt
ØSummary – Report on complete return on investment, including realized and unrealized gains.
ØReturns – Report on unrealized gains only ØCapital Gain Statement – Report on realized gain, useful for tax computations ØHolding – Scheme/Folio current balances ØDividend – Report on Dividend Reinvested / Payout ØA/c Statement – Transaction statement ØInsurance – Gives details of all your insurances. ØUtility: a) MF Tally - You can see trailing returns for your schemes or for any other scheme as available in any other mutual fund research portal. b) NAV – Per Unit price of mutual fund schemes c) Latest indices d) ULIP’s - unit price of unit linked insurance schemes
To view you will have to
- Click on the respective tab
- Select the applicant name or choose all
- Then click on show
In case you are not able to log on or want to reset your password please mail in to praful.panchal@ffreedom.in
Please feel free to contact us for any clarifications.
